recipe.title: Caesar Salad with Sourdough Croutons
ingredients: 2 large hearts of romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces (about 12 cups)
instructions: Whisk first 6 ingredients in small bowl. Gradually whisk in oil, then 1/2 cup cheese. Toss lettuce, croutons, 1/4 cup cheese, and dressing in bowl. Sprinkle with parsley and season to taste with pepper.
